channel.title: 443 Deob [2006 Christmas Update]
channel.description:
After coming across a 443 cache and an ugly-looking bad attempt at refactoring some of it, I decided to extract the client and deobfuscate/decompile it myself. Thanks to Popcorn89 and Mgi125 for their deobfuscation and decompiling tools. Mgi125's tool removed/fixed a bunch of dummies, most of the XOR number compares, method counters, and unnecessarily high/low bit shifts and Popcorn89's tool did the rest.
Just as an idea, Hunter was released on the 438 revision on November 21, 2006. This is before the dark bow, God Wars, wilderness ditch, clan chat, achievement diary, and loot share (At least those are the major ones before the popular revision 474). I don't think there's a public 443 server out there, and I have yet to make one, so I don't know what the gameframe looks like. I haven't refactored any of it (minus the Signlink class) or edited it past where it loads the cache from and the port it connects with (43594) yet.
[b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?l8y18m97d48wkma]Download[/url][/b]
Here are the update keys: [code] -1, 0, -1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 56, 41, -50, -17, 97, 53, 48, 105, -13, -32, 7, -50, -22, 45, 120, -117, -44, -126, 13, 2, -30, -117, 90, 104, 38, 69, 89, 34, -37, 109, -95, -80, 36, 23, -53, 5, -65, 5, -30, 113, -58, 46, -53, -92, -83, -45, 62, 52, 73, -112, 79, 79, -87, 107, 119, 56, 51[/code]
[b]NOTE: [/b]RSA encryption is not disabled on the login! To do so, find the line containing this code and comment it out (It's in the login procedure after the password is sent): [code]method828(Class2.aBigInteger47, Class16.aBigInteger292, -17694);[/code]
~Lin

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:7, topic:452177”]Skillcapes came out before Hunter. :S[/quote]Yup The skillcape was mid October and hunter was mid-late November.

Read full topic

item.title: 443 Deob [2006 Christmas Update]
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Just so everyone knows, this is the Christmas update client - AKA the oldest 2006 one. Notice the snowman being made out of fire.

Pretty cool. Unfortunately, the maps are encrypted, so you’ll have to load dumped ones.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Scully, post:5, topic:452177”][quote author=TheHolyGrail link=topic=555060.msg4064475#msg4064475 date=1343745410]
Cool. Hunter was released in 435 btw.
[/quote]
Nope, 435 was the Skillcape, updated tabs update.

435:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ef3SH.png[img][/quote]Oh, I’ve had that mixed up this whole time then lol, thanks for clearing that up.

Read full topic
